(1) mvn install -> <project-root>/bundlemaker.thirdparty/pom.xml
(2) mvn install -> <project-root>/bundlemaker.thirdparty/step1_bundles/pom.xml
(3) mvn install -> <project-root>/bundlemaker.thirdparty/pom.xml

Result in <project-root>/bundlemaker.thirdparty/step2_plugins-features/p2/org.bundlemaker.thirdparty.p2/target/repository
